sentences.en: He always wore real hipster trousers which showed the cheeks of his bum.
sentences.cn: 他总穿着那条真正称的上超低腰的裤子,露出双臀.

sentences.en: In 1960 s England, the Vespa shuttled around the sharp, suit - wearing hipster group Known as the Mods.
sentences.cn: 1960年代的英国, 伟士牌在一群西装笔挺的时髦雅痞[摩登一族]间广为流行.

sentences.en: So what do you guys think — gay or maybe just the world's first (straight) hipster?
sentences.cn: 你们怎么想——同性恋者还是只是一个世界上第一个赶时髦的直人。

words.tran_cn: 熟悉内情的；非常时尚的
世面灵通的人；赶时髦的人；颓废派成员（等于beatnik）

trans.tran_cn: 裤腰低到臀部的裤子，<俚>消息灵通人士
